title: Calendar and Scheduling Applications
description: Build custom calendar and scheduling applications with Kliv
metaDescription: Create powerful calendar and scheduling apps with Kliv. Build booking systems, appointment managers, and event planning tools with AI assistance.
defaultPrompt: I want to build a calendar and scheduling app with appointment booking, availability management, automated reminders, and calendar integrations.

hero.title: Build Calendar & Scheduling Applications
hero.subtitle: Create custom calendar applications, booking systems, and scheduling tools that fit your exact business needs.

sections.title: Scheduling Made Simple
sections.content:
Whether you need appointment booking, event management, or resource scheduling, Kliv helps you build the perfect calendar application for your business.

Create intuitive interfaces that make scheduling effortless for both you and your customers.

items.title: Appointment Booking
items.description: Allow customers to book appointments with availability checking and confirmation.

items.title: Event Management
items.description: Create and manage events with attendee tracking and notifications.

items.title: Resource Scheduling
items.description: Schedule rooms, equipment, and other resources with conflict prevention.

items.title: Calendar Integration
items.description: Sync with Google Calendar, Outlook, and other popular calendar services.

sections.title: Ready to Build Your Scheduling Solution?
sections.content: Create the perfect calendar application for your business needs.
